name: Global Pandemic (Team Bacon x Pogo)
description:
Controls:

WASD: Move around the level

Mouse: Aim and draw barriers

Space: Dash

Gameplay:

- Try to isolate the infected people from those who are safe

- If infected people come in contact with those who are not, they will spread the virus

- Draw a barrier around normal people to vaccinate them from the virus

- Draw a barrier around the infected ones to capture them, then lead them to the doctor's place to cure

- If the barrier comprises both normal and infected people, all of them will be infected

- If you get infected by touching sick people, you have to cure yourself before your HP runs out.
